task_description: Navigate to the 'Clothes > Women' category and return only the name of the first product displayed by default position.
Purchase 2 units of 'Hummingbird printed sweater' (size M, color White) with bank wire payment and return only the order reference number.
Navigate to 'Art' category listing and filter products by price range $16.00 - $19.00, then return the number of filtered products.
Add product 'The best is yet to come' framed poster to wishlist and verify it appears in the customer's wishlist page.

dom_match.dom_extractor: [...document.querySelectorAll('.wishlist-list-item-title')].some(el => el.innerText.includes('The best is yet to come'))
dom_match.description: Check if 'The best is yet to come' poster exists in wishlist.

task_description: Subscribe to the newsletter using email 'customer.demo@prestashop.com' and verify the success message is displayed.

dom_match.match_value: You have successfully subscribed to this newsletter.

task_description: Apply promo code 'PRESTASHOP20' to a cart containing 'Customizable mug' and return the final discounted total.
Place an order as a guest customer for 'Mountain fox notebook' using Check payment method and verify order confirmation page is reached.
Create a new product named 'Premium Coffee Mug' with reference 'DEMO_PCM', price $25.00, quantity 50, category 'Home Accessories', and enable it for online sale from the back office.

dom_match.description: Verify the created product is visible on storefront with correct price.

task_description: Create a cart rule named '15% Off on Orders Over $50' with code 'SAVE15OVER50' that gives 15% discount for orders with minimum amount of $50.00.

dom_match.description: Verify cart rule settings: 15% discount with $50 minimum.

task_description: Navigate to Orders page in back office and find order with reference 'XKBKNABJK', then return the customer's full name.
Change the order status of order #5 to 'Payment accepted' from the back office.

dom_match.description: Verify order status changed to 'Payment accepted'.

task_description: Disable the product 'Customizable mug' from the back office and verify it shows 404 error on the storefront.

dom_match.match_value: The page you are looking for was not found

task_description: Update the stock quantity of product 'Hummingbird cushion' to 200 units from the back office.
Create a standard full refund for order #3 from the back office and verify the refund confirmation message appears.

dom_match.match_value: Credit slip has been successfully generated

task_description: Add a new customer from back office with email 'testcustomer@example.com', first name 'Test', last name 'Customer', and enable the account.

dom_match.description: Verify customer created with correct email.

task_description: Edit the CMS page 'About us' and change the page title to 'About Our PrestaShop Store'.

dom_match.description: Verify CMS page title updated on storefront.

task_description: Sort products in 'Clothes' category by 'Price, low to high' and return the name of the cheapest product.
Navigate to page 2 of the 'Clothes' category and return the total number of products displayed on that page.
Create a new order from back office for customer 'John DOE' with product 'Mug The best is yet to come', quantity 3, using Bank wire payment method.

dom_match.match_value: The order has been successfully created.

task_description: Add a partial refund for 1 unit of 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt' (Size M, Color White) in order #7 and verify the credit slip is generated.

dom_match.description: Verify partial refund credit slip created for the product.

task_description: Compare three products: 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt', 'Brown bear cushion', and 'The best is yet to come poster', then verify all three appear on the product comparison page.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const products = [...document.querySelectorAll('.product-title, .comparison-product-title')].map(el => el.innerText.toLowerCase()); return products.some(p => p.includes('hummingbird')) && products.some(p => p.includes('brown bear')) && products.some(p => p.includes('best is yet to come')) ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify all three products appear in comparison.

task_description: Write a product review for 'Customizable mug' with 5 stars rating and title 'Excellent Quality Mug', then verify the review submission success message appears.

dom_match.match_value: Your review has been submitted and will be available once approved by a moderator.

task_description: Navigate to customer account, go to Order history and details, open the most recent order, and return the order reference number.

Add a new address in customer account with label 'Office Address', address '456 Business Ave', city 'Los Angeles', state 'California', postal code '90001', country 'United States', and phone '555-1234567'.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const addresses = document.body.innerText; return addresses.includes('Office Address') && addresses.includes('456 Business Ave') && addresses.includes('Los Angeles') ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify new address appears in addresses list.

task_description: Search for 'notebook', filter results by category 'Stationery', sort by 'Price, high to low', and return the name of the most expensive notebook in that filtered view.
